Offering everything one expects from a 3 bedroom luxury home - secure side by side car parking for 2 cars with attached storage, security coded entry foyer and coded passenger lift to the penthouse lobby but lets cut straight to the good stuff. The views are OUTSTANDING. They encompass the CBD, Northern Ranges, Dandenong Ranges to back over Richmond. Youll be so busy admiring the vista laid out before you, you will need to tear your eyes away to actually inspect the three bedrooms each with robes, the master bedroom with ensuite, walk in robe and private balcony plus the two additional bathrooms.
While your attention is diverted from the eye-popping-head-on-a-swivel stick views yes theres more indoors to admire - the expansive living, meals and kitchen - Wow this is amazing! Gas fireplace, oak floors, chandelier, double wine fridge, storage lots of storage. Plus the luxury kitchen has all the inclusions one would expect. A nod to the areas heritage is on show with exposed concrete ceilings and brick walls. Zoned to each room air conditioning, double glazed/tinted glass, video/intercom to the front door. Gosh Ill need to sit down to absorb all this.
Lets get back to those views - panoramic north facing views from every window to the City, King Lake Ranges, Dandenong Ranges, South/East Melbourne. If the views from inside your windows simply arent enough, then bring the outdoors in or simply extend the entertaining thru the fully opening stacker doors on to the full width north facing balcony sheltered by fully automated awnings.
Above all is the incredible convenience of a superb location all in a smaller boutique building, just a very short walk ( 100m) to Smith St for food, shopping and tram, I could go on and on, but really a personal inspection would be best to appreciate how good this is.

Holme Sweet Holme - Huge 107m2 Corner Entertainer's Apartment
Rising from its distinctive island site on the doorstep of East Melbourne, the CBD and the cultural and culinary activity of Smith and Gertrude Streets, Holme is a place of sanctuary an increasingly refined chapter in Collingwood's evolution. Completed in September 2019 and set in the most exclusive pocket of Collingwood, this oversized, John Wardle designed 2 bedroom/2 bathroom apartment is an entertainers dream. Positioned on the East/South corner of the elegant, glass curtain building it boasts an abundance of light and well considered floorplan. At a generous 107m2, it is has been meticulously designed to impress. Enter through the foyer which expands into the oversized open plan living/dining zone with floor to ceiling double glazed windows anchoring the entire East and South exposures and large full width balcony. The chef's kitchen (Asko appliances) with island bench takes pride of place in the centre of the entertaining area with both bedrooms completely separated for privacy. The master suite has private access to the balcony, walk through robe and ensuite bathroom. An enviable list of property features: euro laundry (including ASKO washer & dryer), oak floor boards, quality wood work joinery and two pac finish, looped wool carpet, reconstituted stone benchtops, brushed stainless steel tapware, intercom access, secure parking and storage cage. Includes 9th floor communal lounge and entertaining areas.
